name: Hero Havoc
description:
Hero Havoc is a third person super hero roguelike. Battle through Wellington City after a local group of criminals have stolen alien weapons and blocked the police from entering. Pick up canisters of alien power to increase and evolve your powers. 

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look
  • Scroll wheel to melee
  • Left click to use power
  • Right click to aim
  • Press shift while holding A or D to dash in that direction

Find the key card somewhere in the city to let the cops back in. 

As of the current date, March 11, 2023, Hero Havoc is in an alpha stage. It was developed for the 2023 7DRL. Sadly, I over scoped a little so I wasn't able to complete as much as I wanted in this time span but I'm wanting to continue development on it further.

All 3D assets are from Synty Store. Animations were purchased from the Unreal Marketplace and were from Yummy Games, wemakethegame, and MoCap Online.
